bdi4jade.belief

Class AbstractBeliefSet<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.core.MetadataElementImpl
      • bdi4jade.belief.AbstractBelief<java.util.Set<T>>
        • bdi4jade.belief.AbstractBeliefSet<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the belief set values.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Belief<java.util.Set<T>>, BeliefSet<T>, MetadataElement, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransientBeliefSet

    public abstract class AbstractBeliefSet<T>
extends AbstractBelief<java.util.Set<T>>
implements BeliefSet<T>
    This is an abstract class that implements the BeliefSet interface, and extends the AbstractBeliefSet class, parameterizing it with a parameterized Set. It implements some of the interface methods, leaving some implementations to the subclasses, mainly the choice of how the belief set values are stored.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
